The Darling Buds of May
programme.desc: When the Green Woods Laugh - Part One: Comedy-drama series. Ma starts making plans for a lavish wedding, but has Pop overreached himself with his offer of a stately home? S1 Ep3

programme.title: The Darling Buds of May
programme.desc: When the Green Woods Laugh - Part Two: Comedy-drama. Pop Larkin is about to join the large number of villagers who wish with all their hearts that they'd never met Corinne Perigo... S1 Ep4

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: First Aid: 70s sitcom. Inspector Blake demands that all bus crews pass a first aid test or be suspended. S3 Ep1

programme.title: Mutiny On the Buses
programme.desc: British comedy spin-off film sequel starring Reg Varney and Doris Hare, 1972. When Stan agrees to get married, Olive's husband Arthur begins a successful career as a bus driver.

programme.title: Carry On Camping
programme.desc: British comedy film starring Sid James and Barbara Windsor, 1969. When two men take their girlfriends on a camping holiday to a nudist camp, they find that they have been misled...

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Sleeping Murder: Crime thriller. When Gwenda Halliday moves into the home of her dreams, she begins to see ghostly apparitions that lead Miss Marple to an unsolved murder. S2 Ep1

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Fast Love: Crime drama. Vera is brought to market when a lovable rogue trader is found dead in a lane following a suspected hit-and-run, and a familiar face is back on the scene. S13 Ep1

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: For Death Prepare: The Midsomer Mummers amateur operatic society are busy rehearsing for a charity concert when the body of an unknown man is found in their theatre... but why? S22 Ep5

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Scarecrow Murders: The annual Midsomer Scarecrow Festival takes a grisly turn when bodies begin appearing on poles displayed alongside their straw creations. S22 Ep4

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Love and Violence: Comedy-drama series. Ma issues Pop some tough love while playing Cupid between Primrose and the Reverend Candy, and an old friend of Pop's arrives in the village. S2 Ep3

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Wheels of Justice: Comedy-drama series. Ma and the children try to convince Pop to take the court case seriously, but he has fun on his mind and is conducting his own defence... S2 Ep4

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: There But the Grace of God: Classic British sitcom. Oliver has a clumsy new assistant in his antique shop, and Simon is unhappy when Aunt Eleanor offers his bed to an old friend. S10 Ep5

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: A Car by Any Other Name: Classic British sitcom. The vicar wants to sell his car and gets Simon to help, but confusion soon reigns when Oliver tries to sell his car at the same time. S10 Ep6

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Nowhere to Go: 70s sitcom about a bus company. Arthur's bike breaks down, threatening Stan's plans for a day out with the girls. S4 Ep1

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: Viva Espana: Classic British sitcom. When Ringo wins a holiday in Spain, Simon and Oliver are soon vying to accompany him. S11 Ep1

programme.title: Never the Twain
programme.desc: The Best Laid Plans: Classic British sitcom. Simon decides that a celebration is in order when he and Oliver reach their tenth anniversary as neighbours. S11 Ep2

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: The 'L' Bus: Stan needs to transport Arthur and Olive's new bed to the house so he uses the 'L' bus, the passenger-free bus used to train drivers. S4 Ep6

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Kids' Outing: Blakey takes pleasure in making Stan and Jack man the bus for the dreaded kids' outing. Blakey accuses Stan of giving his nephew a girlie magazine. S4 Ep7

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Allegory of Love: Detective drama. Lewis investigates the murder of a beautiful young Eastern European woman whose death comes straight from the pages of a popular fantasy novel. S3 Ep1

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Sleeping Murder: Crime thriller. When Gwenda Halliday moves into the home of her dreams, she begins to see ghostly apparitions that lead Miss Marple to an unsolved murder. S2 Ep1

programme.title: The Darling Buds of May
programme.desc: A Breath of French Air - Part One: Comedy-drama series. The wet English summer has dampened the Larkins' spirits and those of Charley and Mariette - perhaps a holiday is required... S1 Ep5

programme.title: The Darling Buds of May
programme.desc: A Breath of French Air - Part Two: Comedy-drama series. Pop and Ma are enjoying their French holiday while Charley and Mariette suffer, and Primrose has problems with Marc-Antoine. S1 Ep6

programme.title: Holiday On the Buses
programme.desc: British comedy spin-off film sequel starring Reg Varney, 1973. When Stan and Jack are sacked by the bus company for two crashes, they seek fun new employment at a holiday camp.

programme.title: Carry On Cruising
programme.desc: British comedy film starring Sid James and Kenneth Williams, 1962. The captain of a cruise ship needs a replacement crew fast, but the substitutes aren't what the captain expected.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: The Moving Finger: Crime thriller. The town of Lymstock is thrown into turmoil when an outbreak of anonymous hate mail results in a woman's suicide and the letters become deadlier. S2 Ep2

programme.title: Vera
